```{r}
library(ramp.xds)
library(ramp.work)
```

```{r sis}
sis <- readRDS("./models/sis.rds") 
```

**Broken** 

```{r, eval=F}
sis_trv <- sis 
sis_trv <- setup_travel_eir(sis_trv, 5/365)
sis_trv <- setup_static_travel(sis_trv, 0.05, 1) 
```

```{r, eval=F}
xds_scaling(sis_trv, 25) -> sis_trv
```

```{r, eval=F}
plot_eirpr(sis, grey(.8))
lines_eirpr(sis_trv, "darkgreen")
```
